blogPosts.title: Introduction to React
blogPosts.content: React.js is a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces. This post covers the basics of React, including components, props, and state.

comments.comment: Great introduction! Helped me understand React better.

blogPosts.title: Understanding JavaScript Closures
blogPosts.summary: A deep dive into JavaScript closures.
blogPosts.content: Closures are a fundamental concept in JavaScript. This post explains how closures work and provides examples of their usage.

comments.comment: This was very insightful. Thanks for the clear explanation!

blogPosts.title: CSS Grid Layout
blogPosts.summary: An overview of CSS Grid and how to use it.
blogPosts.content: CSS Grid Layout is a powerful layout system in CSS. This post provides an overview of CSS Grid and practical examples of how to use it.

blogPosts.title: The Art of Debugging
blogPosts.summary: Tips and tricks for effective debugging.
blogPosts.content: Debugging is an essential skill for developers. This post shares various strategies and tools for debugging code effectively.
